text: aur log ittifaaq se koee badakaaree kar baithate hain ya aap apane oopar julm karate hain to khuda ko yaad karate hain aur apane gunaahon kee maafee mogate hain aur khuda ke siva gunaahon ka bakhshane vaala aur kaun hai aur jo (qoosoor) vah (naagahaanee) kar baithe to jaanaboojh kar usapar hat nahin karate
